basics.name: Michael Perry Goodman
basics.about: Started my career as both designer and developer, self-taught in both skills, and have a very good understanding of how both of these roles work independently as well as some opinions on how they ought to work together.

work.summary:
For almost two decades I've worked with web design and development agencies in a variety of industries, with brands such as Kraft, IBM, Wilson, Abbott, and many others.

My primary focus in most of these roles has been tasks like page templating, converting design comps into live pages with [insert web tech here], and application UI, however i've become a swiss army knife of sorts, with skills ranging from logo design to site wire frames to HTML email development to single page apps.
Largely Wordpress based APIs and Vue front-ends using docker/K8s, updating and adding to Django/Wagtail applications, and a Hugo blog using Forestry CMS.
Website development with the Zurb Foundation framework and Craft CMS, Handlebars templates, MySQL, and Nginx web servers. HTML email campaign templates and compatibility testing with Litmus.

Creating React JSX templates for a Rails-based REST API, Github repository and Heroku deployment. Website redesign front-end work in React. Maintain a small suite of Rails engine applications and providing team support.

Development and maintenance of the BigTime IQ application including development of new front-end feature functionality, User Experience planning, UI develoment via CSS, code refactoring. Additionally, development of corporate Wordpress theme UI.
Worked with a large variety of clients from Fortune 500 to small shops doing an array of different work from print templates to microsites and single page applications.
Website development with various JS frameworks, HTML email mark-up, microsites, responsive design development, legacy browser compliant mark-up, CSS3 animations.
Front-end website development, HTML email markup, HTML5 iPad slides, CSS3 animations.
UI development of proprietary data analysis marketing tools, web form design, photograph touch-up/treatments, print design (brochure, business cards), logo design, banner ads, etc.
Flash website development, web site mock-ups, banner ads. UI development of proprietary CMS environment.
